you can dodge it actually. yes, its very reliable, but also costs a crapton of mana, doesnt deal a lot of damage and has a fairly long cooldown. at least compared to abilities like ziggs q.

pick up an early mantle or a catalyst and go into rod of ages and her poke becomes meaningless.

You can misleading her prediction.
It **does** require prediction, directly point it on a target waking in a straight line would make you miss even if you instant trigger.
I'm a lux main and I prove this.
